title.rendered: Butragueno: Real will give its best in the games against Manchester City – www.1xBet.ng/en

content.rendered:
Many language choices, a huge selection of games, hundreds of slots are awaiting you. Visit www.1xBet.ng/en, claim your welcome bonuses and other types of free bets.

Real and Barcelona can have a match in Las Vegas. This is reported by the Washington Post. According to the source, the meeting may be held in the International Champions Cup next summer. The organizers of the tournament are interested in holding the match between principal rivals – according to their plan, the game should be held at the new stadium of the NFL club “Las Vegas Raiders”.

If the parties come to an agreement, the meeting between Real Madrid and Barcelona will be the first sporting event in the Allegiant arena, which seats 61 thousand people. In this case, the organizers are exploring other options. In particular, the game may be held in Ingwood, California. For more information and prediction visit www.1xBet.ng/en.

Real can pay 111 million euros for Martinez – bets online for sport on 1xBet website

Real Madrid is considering signing forward Lautaro Martinez. This is reported by Sky Sports. According to the source, they are ready to activate the point of redemption, which is 111 million euros. It’s hard to achive millions, but you can definitely win thousands by placing bets online for sport on 1xBet website.

It is noted that the leaders of Real considers this amount as relatively acceptable. In addition the Madrid club, the 22-year-old forward is also interested in Barcelona.

This season Martinez took part in 28 games in Inter, noting 16 goals scored and 4 goal passes. The contract of the player with the club expires in the summer of 2023.

Upcoming fixtures of Real Madrid – Place bets online for sport on 1xBet website

February 2020

  • Sunday 16th February            Real Madrid – Celta Vigo      
  • Saturday 22nd February                     Levante            – Real Madrid
  • Wednesday 26th February      Real Madrid – Manchester City         

March 2020

  • Sunday 1st March                   Real Madrid – Barcelona       
  • Sunday 8th March                   Real Betis – Real Madrid

Donnarumma may go to Real Madrid – 1xBet – watch sport online streaming now

Goalkeeper of Milan Donnarumma may soon move to the top club of Europe. Visit 1xBet – watch sport online streaming now. Representatives of Real Madrid have already made a proposal for the goalkeeper of the Italian national team.

In addition to the club in Madrid, Juventus also wants the young talent to move to its squad. Juventus is offering him a contract with a salary of 9 million a year. The salary of the 20-year-old goalkeeper is 6 million euros a year. The current contract with Milan ends in the end of 2021.

Gianluigi Donnarumma joined Milan’s youth team in 2013. In the season 2016/17 he became the only Milan player who played all 41 matches without substitutions. This season he played 23 games for the “Red and Black”, conceded 32 goals.

Claim a 100% bonus on your first deposit for the first time. Bet on sports from major ones like football and tennis to more specialized ones like snooker and netball. Visit the site 1xBet – watch sport online streaming now.
